justification: “The 11-item numeracy scale developed by Lipkus, Samsa, and Rimer (2001) … was administered.”

measured_by: Weller et al. 8-item Abbreviated Numeracy Scale
justification: “The Weller et al. scale … an 8-item abbreviated numeracy scale … was also administered to all participants.”

measured_by: Gambling task obtaining certainty equivalents for 176 two-outcome gambles
justification: “Participants responded to a series of 176 gambles and CE data were derived from participant responses… α, δ and γ were estimated as measures of the probability weighting function.”
